info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 10:02AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Henderson, central Warren, southern Mercer, southeastern Henry, central Des Moines and northeastern Lee Counties through 1030 AM CDT... At 1002 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Burlington, or near Burlington, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burlington, Monmouth, Oquawka, West Burlington, Danville, Kirkwood, Little York, Middletown, Biggsville, Gladstone, Rozetta, Gulf Port, Lake Warren, Iowa Army Ammunition Plant, Bald Bluff, Media, Gerlaw, Welter Recreation Area, Shokokon and Spring Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
